About the purpose of the Military Training Assembly
About the regulations of the Military Training Assembly
・経典結社リュダについて

The religious society that conquered and destroyed "Dawn's
Ear," the hometown of Segi and Yuia, manages its followers
through unique scriptures and military force.

It can be called a night-watch state, and in recent years,
it has expanded its influence by subjugating surrounding
villages one after another with its advanced technology and
military power.
・練兵会開催の目的について

Each family is forced to provide one representative for
military service, and these representatives are made to
fight each other in combat tournaments for training
purposes.

Multiple duels between residents are held simultaneously,
and afterwards, a few outstanding soldiers are selected to
be recruited into the ranks of Luda.

After the opponents are decided, the battle takes place
after a few days of preparation. During this time, the
participating warriors strategize for the fight.

The duel is decided by death, incapacitation, or surrender.
However, even surrender does not guarantee safety
thereafter.

If defeated in battle, men are imprisoned and subjected to
harsh forced labor. Women are forced to live as the
concubines of the victors or Luda soldiers.

To win the training tournament and save her imprisoned
husband Yuia through the amnesty that comes as a reward.

In order to do so, she must gather information about her
opponents in the tournament, train herself in the ruins, and
win the competition.

As Yuia is imprisoned as a serious criminal, it is essential
to continue paying tributes to Luda for his life extension
measures, and Segi must not fail to do so during the
tournament.

If the tribute is discontinued, it means losing the
guarantee of her imprisoned husband Yuia's life.

The side effect caused by Segi, who lacks combat experience,
taking the secret medicine "Mind.Luda" that enhances
physical abilities.

Her lust rises and accumulates daily, and when it reaches
the limit (maximum value 100), an uncontrollable intense
sexual urge will overcome her body.

To prevent lust, it is necessary to lower the maximum value
through meetings with her husband Yuia or medication.
Engaging in sexual acts is also effective in relieving
sexual urges.

The ruins that gave their name to the underwater ruins city
where Segi and others live. It was once a tunnel dug using
criminals.

Rare resources were excavated inside the ruins, but at the
same time, it became a dangerous place filled with poison
gas and rampant monsters.

The poison gas continues to seep out even now. However,
since Luda's technology has developed an antidote to avoid
the gas, exploration inside has become possible.

The story is divided into chapters for each match, such as
the first match → second match.

Gather information for your next fight in town, explore
ruins to acquire money and items.

In scenes where useful information or events necessary for
story progression occur, a [■EV occurrence■] mark will be
displayed.

\C[1]Blue indicates \C[0]conversation events or story progression
flags, \C[10]red\C[0] is displayed when an event scene is
included.

The story may progress by advancing the date. If you feel
there is no progress, rest in your home bed.

If there is a \C[3]■Rest Possible■\C[0] mark on your home
bed, you can recover your strength and move time forward to
the next day.

In this case, minor conversation events that could occur on
that day will be skipped and time will move on to the next
day.

Also, each character generally appears in the same place. It
is recommended to visit places like the tavern where Rozaro,
an ally, is located or Irime's home frequently.

Segi's ultimate goal is to win the training tournament
without defeat. If achieved, she can save her husband Yuia
and their family can return to their former life.

However, if Segi is defeated by men who aim to fight her in
the tournament, she will become theirs.

By being defiled by them, Segi will face different outcomes
with each of the men.

On the eve of the final match of the training tournament,
she must choose an ending with one of the men, whether she
wants to or not...
